<title level="1" right="Rules">[Varying Statistics](/Rules.aspx?ID=760)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 597 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Each type of wand has a Level and Price determined by the spell's level. The wand's rarity matches the spell's rarity, and it has its spell's traits. A wand has the normal Hardness, BT, and HP of a thin item of its material (see [Table 11-4](/Rules.aspx?ID=730)).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
